message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the opportunity cost, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects the balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a fair deal. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.
